title: Not getting chests when premade teamate gets S, do I have to own their champ too?
body: Not getting chests when premade teamate gets S, do I have to own their champ too?

replies.body:
My question is not about receiving a chest for my own performance but "when premade teammate gets S".

From the FaQ
"If you do earn an S rank on a champion you don't own, allies in your premade group may still earn a chest through your achievement."

In these cases I'm playing Lux with top tier mastery and a friend gets an S with Fiddlesticks.  Do I have to own fiddlesticks to get a box? (because I am not getting boxes.  I have boxes available to "earn".  My assumption I saw play out previously is that you can earn a box from a premade teammate getting an S every time they do so as long as you have boxes available to "earn".)

I'm guessing you probably got a box from Lux yes?

For some reason the system is set up in a way that if a premade gets an S, it checks off whatever champ YOU played, not the one they were playing. IE: if you played as {{champion:58}}  and your premade pal {{champion:34}} got an S, you would get a box for Renekton, not Anivia. What this unfortunately means is that if you already got a box with Lux, you won't get any chests from premades if you play as her.

You can obtain mastery chests through your premade as long as you own the champion and haven't already gotten one for that champ.  There is also a limit on how may chests you can earn for that week, which is visible through your profile page.  More details on how this works is available through our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide as well.  Let me know if you have any questions!
No, I think you just need to own the champ you are playing and not have gotten a chest with that Champ before.
